Rules.InvariantScript:
If(Self.TotalPage<10,
    RenameColumns(
        Sequence(Self.TotalPage), 
        "Value", "Index"),
    RenameColumns(
        Sequence(
            If(Self.CurrentPage>=(RoundDown(Self.TotalPage,-1)),
            Self.TotalPage-RoundDown(Self.CurrentPage,-1)+1,10
            ),
            If(Self.CurrentPage>=(RoundDown(Self.TotalPage,-1)),
                RoundDown(Self.CurrentPage,-1),
                If(
                        RoundDown(Self.CurrentPage,-1)=0,
                        RoundDown(Self.CurrentPage,-1)+1,
                        RoundDown(Self.CurrentPage,-1))
            )
        ),
        "Value", "Index"))
